name: 25 Days of Christmas 2018
description:
Discover the new version of Advent Calendar and play with a new different game every day, until Santa arrives!

Discover a free Christmas app every day with Advent 2018 - a modern take on everyone’s favourite festive calendar!

Explore an enchanting Winter Wonderland as you open the windows scattered through our calendar from December 1st to discover 25 amazing free gifts and magically bring the Christmas scene to life.

Advent 2018 features:

* DAILY MINI GAMES TO PLAY - From snowball fights with elves to decorating Christmas trees, play a new festive mini game every day.

* DISCOVER A BEAUTIFUL CHRISTMAS LANDSCAPE - Scroll your way through our festive world to discover an enchanting village that is brought to life with gorgeous graphics, heart warming animations and tinkling jingle bells.

Family friendly and suitable for all ages, download Advent 2018 now and bring the exciting countdown to Christmas to life on your touchscreen device.

Share and enjoy!
A very Merry Christmas from your AppChocolate Team
